app_tagline: A steady point in the storm
step1_desc: Leave the trigger immediately. Close the tab, leave the room, step away.
step2_desc: 4-4-6 breathing: inhale 4 seconds, hold 4 seconds, exhale 6 seconds. Repeat 3 times.
step3_desc: Do a quick action: walk outside, cold water on face, call someone, do push-ups.
import_password_prompt: Enter your PIN to decrypt the data
export_no_password_warning: No PIN defined. Data will be exported in plain text.
spiritual_cards_desc: Show inspiring reminders adapted to your faith
exposure_desc: Were you exposed to a trigger today?
notes_placeholder: How are you feeling? What happened?
import_success: Import successful! Your data has been restored.
clear_confirm: Are you sure? All your data will be deleted. This action is irreversible.
onboarding_desc: Set up your personal space. All your data stays on your device.
onboarding_import_pin_desc: Enter the PIN code used during export
select_addictions: Which habits do you want to track?
craving_logged: Logged. You took care of yourself.
craving_subtitle: You made the right choice coming here
craving_timer_desc: The urge will pass. Breathe and follow the steps.
auto_lock_description: Automatically locks the application after a period of inactivity
auto_lock_on_tab_blur_description: Locks the app when switching tabs
privacy_note: All your data is stored locally on your device. Nothing is sent to the internet.
no_addiction_selected: Select at least one addiction to track in settings.
first_time: First time? Set up your space.
protocol_subtitle: You can help yourself now. Let's breathe together.
protocol_step3: Wash your face with cold water
protocol_moved: I moved / I left the room
you_are_stronger: You are stronger than you think.
confirm_new_intention: You already have an intention for today. Generate a new one?
slope_subtitle: You did well to stop. Take care of yourself now.
exposed_today: Were you exposed to adult content today?
exposed_no: No - you took care of yourself
relapse_message: You made a mistake, but you're here. That's what matters.
relapse_message2: Let's answer 3 quick questions to learn from this moment.
triggers_desc: Select situations that put you at risk
help_content: If you're going through a difficult time, you're not alone. Talk to a trusted person or contact a health professional.
env_phone_out: Phone out of bedroom at night
urge_surfing_intro: The urge is like a wave. It rises, peaks, then falls. Observe it without acting.
urge_surfing_step1: 1. Sit comfortably and close your eyes.
urge_surfing_step2: 2. Notice where you feel the urge in your body.
urge_surfing_step4: 4. Imagine the urge as a passing wave.
coaching.insight.week_comparison: This week is busier than the previous one.
coaching.mode.observer.description: Few interventions, mostly retrospective. Ideal for autonomous users.
coaching.mode.stability.description: One anchor at a time, transitions priority. Discrete but structuring coaching.
coaching.mode.guided.description: More feedback, more frequent suggestions. Slightly more detailed explanations.
coaching.mode.silent.description: Almost invisible coaching. Only if high instability detected. No spontaneous display.
coaching.mode.title: Coaching mode
coaching.insight.stabilizing.general: A link between instability ({instabilityScore}/2) and emergencies ({cravings}) has been observed.
coaching.insight.stabilizing.stress: High stress ({stress}/10) seems linked to emergencies ({cravings}).
coaching.habit.morning.water: Morning anchor: a glass of water upon waking can structure the start of the day.
coaching.habit.day.pause: Day anchor: a 2-minute pause every afternoon can rhythm the time.
coaching.habit.evening.closure: Evening anchor: closing the day with 5 minutes of calm can facilitate the transition.
coaching.transition.evening: End of evening: closing this moment with a simple action can reduce risk.
coaching.transition.stress: After a stressful moment: a gentle transition can help return to calm.
coaching.no_insight_available: No insight available yet. Come back later.
coaching.porn.evening_solitude: Evening moments of solitude often return.
coaching.porn.low_energy: Urgencies appear especially when energy is low.
coaching.porn.stayed_present: You stayed present despite several urges this week.
coaching.porn.calm_evenings: Calm evenings are sometimes more sensitive. Preparing an action in advance can help.
coaching.porn.boredom_urge: When boredom sets in, the urge can rise gently.
coaching.porn.phone_bed: Moments alone with the phone in bed are more delicate.
coaching.porn.leave_room: Leaving the room for a few minutes can break the momentum.
coaching.porn.water_face: Drinking water or washing your face sometimes helps bring it down.
coaching.porn.short_movement: A short movement (walk, stretch) can help pass the peak.
coaching.cigarette.routine_cravings: Cravings often return in usual routines.
coaching.cigarette.stress_intensity: Stress seems to amplify the intensity of cravings.
coaching.cigarette.traversed_cravings: You've gone through several cravings without smoking.
coaching.cigarette.break_moments: Break moments are sometimes more sensitive.
coaching.cigarette.social_situations: Social situations can trigger an automatic craving.
coaching.cigarette.fatigue_urge: When fatigue is there, the urge can seem stronger.
coaching.cigarette.change_routine: Changing routine for a few minutes can be enough.
coaching.cigarette.breathe_minute: Breathing slowly for 1 minute sometimes helps.
coaching.cigarette.occupy_hands: Occupying your hands can reduce the intensity.
coaching.alcohol.end_of_day: Cravings appear especially at the end of the day.
coaching.alcohol.relaxation_moments: Relaxation moments are sometimes associated with alcohol.
coaching.alcohol.attention_occasions: You've been careful on several occasions this week.
coaching.alcohol.social_evenings: Social evenings can be more sensitive.
coaching.alcohol.fatigue_decisions: Fatigue can make decisions more difficult.
coaching.alcohol.alternative_drink: Anticipating an alternative drink can help.
coaching.alcohol.plan_alternative: Planning a non-alcoholic drink in advance can make the choice easier.
coaching.alcohol.pause_before: Taking a pause before deciding sometimes helps.
coaching.alcohol.fresh_air: Going out for fresh air for a few minutes can clarify.
coaching.drugs.stress_cravings: Cravings are often linked to moments of stress.
coaching.drugs.traversed_difficult: You've gone through several difficult moments.
coaching.drugs.fatigue_overload: Periods of fatigue or overload are more sensitive.
coaching.drugs.unexpected_situations: Unexpected situations can increase the urge.
coaching.drugs.remember_why: Remembering why you're being careful can help.
coaching.drugs.leave_context: Moving away from the context for a few minutes can be enough.
coaching.drugs.talk_trusted: Talking to someone you trust can help.
coaching.drugs.simple_physical: Doing a simple physical action sometimes helps bring it down.
coaching.social_media.low_energy_scroll: Scrolling often appears when energy is low.
coaching.social_media.boredom_automatic: Boredom moments often trigger automatic opening.
coaching.social_media.no_objective: Moments without a clear objective are more sensitive.
coaching.social_media.before_sleep: Before sleeping, the urge to scroll often increases.
coaching.social_media.limit_evening: Limiting access in the evening can help.
coaching.social_media.close_app: Closing the app for 10 minutes can be enough.
coaching.social_media.replace_action: Replacing with a short, neutral action sometimes helps.
coaching.social_media.phone_away: Putting the phone out of reach can make a difference.
coaching.gaming.long_sessions: Long sessions often start without clear intention.
coaching.gaming.automatic_pause: Gaming often appears as an automatic break.
coaching.gaming.end_of_day: Ends of day are more sensitive.
coaching.gaming.fatigue_stop: When fatigue is there, it's harder to stop.
coaching.gaming.define_duration: Defining a duration in advance can help.
coaching.gaming.set_timer: Setting a timer before playing can help.
coaching.gaming.physical_break: Taking a physical break sometimes breaks the momentum.
coaching.gaming.change_activity: Changing activity even briefly helps exit automatic mode.
coaching.food.strong_emotion: Cravings often arrive when emotion is strong.
coaching.food.attentive_signals: You've been attentive to several signals.
coaching.food.skip_meals: Skipping meals can increase the urge.
coaching.food.drink_water: Drinking a glass of water can help take a pause.
coaching.food.breathe_seconds: Breathing for a few seconds sometimes helps clarify.
coaching.shopping.emotion_rises: Cravings often appear when emotion rises.
coaching.shopping.promotions_trigger: Promotions can trigger a quick reaction.
coaching.shopping.close_app: Closing the app or site for a few minutes sometimes helps.
coaching.shopping.note_urge: Noting the urge without acting can be enough.
coaching.shopping.remember_goal: Remembering the goal can help take a pause.
playlist_context_morning_description: Texts to start the day well
slope_step2_action2_desc: Drink a glass of cold water
disclaimer_cigarette: This app does not replace a healthcare professional. For smoking cessation, consult a professional.
disclaimer_alcohol: This app does not replace medical or therapeutic support. For problematic consumption, consult a professional.
gambling_tip_pause: A short pause can break the momentum.
gambling_tip_break: Stepping away for a few minutes sometimes helps clarify.
gambling_tip_support: Seeking support can help get through the moment.
coaching.gambling.retro.evening: Urges often appear at the end of the day.
coaching.gambling.retro.financial_stress: Financial stress seems to weigh more on these moments.
coaching.gambling.retro.you_showed_up: You've been through several difficult moments. You stayed present.
coaching.gambling.prev.fatigue: When fatigue is there, decisions are sometimes more difficult.
coaching.gambling.prev.prepare_alt: Preparing an alternative in advance can help when it rises.
coaching.gambling.prev.calm_evenings: Calm evenings can be more sensitive. A small plan can help.
coaching.gambling.presc.pause_before_dec: Taking a pause before deciding can help.
coaching.gambling.presc.step_away: Stepping away from the context for a few minutes can be enough.
coaching.gambling.presc.prepare_action: Planning a simple action in advance can help get through the peak.
commitments_empty_desc: Commitments you make in guided programs will appear here.
